Title: Denial of Service (DoS) attack possibility in TYPO3 component Indexed Search
Description: Due to an oversized maximum result limit, TYPO3 component Indexed Search is susceptible to a Denial of Service attack.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.19, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.19 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.4
